title: To everyone that couldnt ge thte urf figurine in time

embed.description: The Riot Games merch store is here! Discover merch crafted to capture the spirit of League in every stitch and brushstroke, so you can carry a piece of your game wherever you go.

body: If you scroll down to the bottom of the page you will see a spatula symbol. Then the urf figurine will pop up as a buyable figure for figure fest. Random figure included and all!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! (Oh and don't panic about clicking fast enough it just keeps popping up) :D {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body:
Tbh, it's a good deal, but everyone is getting the same old random figure, Gragas. If you don't get him, you are very lucky! I prefer the Heimidonger and gnar bundle, as they were the two I actually wanted! The urf one is Ok, but it's not my favourite, and I defiantly rather someone else over Gragas. 

If you're buying this figure hoping for Vi or Leona, ones that are very popular, think again, as you are very likely to get the unpopular ones (Gragas, Katarina, Gankplank etc...)
